title: They have Sania Mirza
content:

And then Mirza, the trailblazer, came along and did it all before she could turn 20.In 2006 alone she beat the great Martina Hingis (former singles No 1), former No 2 Svetlana Kuznetsova and No 3 Nadia Petrova before reaching a career high of 27 a year later.
